Name: Day of Defeat
About the game: Enlist in an intense brand of Axis vs. Allied teamplay set in the WWII European Theatre of Operations. Players assume the role of light/assault/heavy infantry, sniper or machine-gunner class, each with a unique arsenal of historical weaponry at their disposal. Missions are based on key historical operations. And, as war rages, players must work together with their squad to accomplish a variety of mission-specific objectives.
Meta Title: Day of Defeat: May 1, 2003, Valve and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Day of Defeat? Check out the release date (May 1, 2003), developer insights from Valve, and a complete game summary.
